p: Out of top 4 screened leads 3,5-Di-O-galloylshikimic acid have the highest MM-GBSA dG binding energy of −35.09 Kcal/mol with docking score of −10.3 kcal/mol for M pro. It is also the only lead among top four that lacks a sugar moiety. To fit inside the M pro cavity, the hydroxyl groups of benzoyl moiety are involved in H-bonding with the S4 subsite residues (THR 190), and S1 subsite residues (HIS 163, ASN 142). The hydroxyl group and the oxygen atoms of both the benzoyl groups are found to interact with the LEU 167, GLY 143 and GLU 166 ( Figure 3(iv)).
